artists.name: Vladimir Kozin
artists.bio: Co-editor of PARAZIT collective. Specializes in trash assemblages and corridor performances using found materials from St. Petersburg streets.

artists.name: Semyon Motolyanets
artists.bio: Performance artist and collective organizer. Known for curating biweekly exhibitions in the tight corridor space.

artists.name: Igor Panin
artists.bio: Book designer and installation artist. Created PARAZIT publication (ISBN 978-5-7187-0999-5) documenting 10+ years of collective work.
